workflow.name: Real-time crypto market data from Gate.io with GPT-4o and Telegram
workflow.description:
**Instantly fetch live Gate.io Spot Market data directly in Telegram!**

This workflow integrates the **Gate.io REST v4 API** with **GPT-4.1-mini-powered AI** and **Telegram**, giving traders real-time access to **price action, order books, candlesticks, and trade data**. Perfect for **crypto traders, analysts, and DeFi builders** who need **fast and reliable exchange insights**.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è How It Works

1. A **Telegram bot** listens for user queries (e.g., `"BTC_USDT"`).
2. The workflow securely processes the request, authenticates the user, and attaches a **sessionId**.
3. The **Gate AI Agent** orchestrates data retrieval via **Gate.io Spot Market API**, including:

   * ‚úÖ **Latest Price & 24h Stats** (`/spot/tickers`)
   * ‚úÖ **Order Book Depth** (with best bid/ask snapshots)
   * ‚úÖ **Klines (candlesticks)** for OHLCV data
   * ‚úÖ **Recent Trades** (up to 100 latest trades)
4. Data is optionally cleaned using **Calculator** (for spreads, midpoints, % changes) and **Think** (for formatting).
5. An **AI-powered formatter (GPT-4.1-mini)** structures results into **Telegram-friendly reports**.
6. The final **Gate.io Spot insights** are sent back instantly in **HTML-formatted Telegram messages**.

---

## üí° What You Can Do with This Agent

This AI-driven Telegram bot enables you to:

‚úÖ **Track real-time spot prices** for any Gate.io pair
‚úÖ **Monitor order book depth** (liquidity snapshots)
‚úÖ **View recent trades** for activity insights
‚úÖ **Analyze candlesticks** across multiple intervals
‚úÖ **Compare bid/ask spreads** with calculated metrics
‚úÖ **Get clean, structured data** without raw JSON clutter

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup Steps

1. **Create a Telegram Bot**

   * Use [@BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather) on Telegram to create a bot and obtain an API token.

2. **Configure Telegram API Credentials in n8n**

   * Add your bot token under **Telegram API credentials**.
   * Replace the placeholder Telegram ID in the **Authentication node** with your own.

3. **Import & Deploy Workflow**

   * Load `Gate AI Agent v1.02.json` into **n8n**.
   * Configure your **OpenAI API key** for .
  * Configure your [Gate api key](https://www.gate.com/docs/developers/apiv4/en/).
   * Save and activate the workflow.

4. **Run & Test**

   * Send a query (e.g., `"BTC_USDT"`) to your Telegram bot.
   * Receive **instant Gate.io market insights** formatted for easy reading.

---

## üì∫ Setup Video Tutorial

Watch the full setup guide on YouTube:

[![Watch on YouTube](https://img.youtube.com/vi/_tXy_3iBE4U/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_tXy_3iBE4U&t=2s)


---

‚ö° **Unlock real-time Gate.io Spot Market insights directly in Telegram ‚Äî fast, clean, and reliable.**

---

### üßæ Licensing & Attribution

¬© 2025 **Treasurium Capital Limited Company**
Architecture, prompts, and trade report structure are IP-protected.

**No unauthorized rebranding permitted.**

üîó **For support:** [Don Jayamaha ‚Äì LinkedIn](https://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr)

nodes.name: Splits message is more than 4000 characters

parameters.content:
## Trigger Incoming Telegram Command
Node: Telegram Trigger
**Listens for new Telegram messages** from users.
Triggers the full agent process and passes raw user input downstream.

## Validate User Access
Node: User **Authentication
Checks incoming Telegram ID** against the approved user list.

## Generate Session Metadata
Node: Add S**essionId
Creates a sessionId using the Telegram chat_id**.
This is passed into all downstream tools for memory and workflow routing.

## Main AI Agent: Data Fetcher

**Node: Gate Data Agent**
This is the **core orchestrator**. It uses OpenAI only to **format and present raw Gate.io Spot market data**, not to analyze or generate strategies.

It has direct **HTTP GET access** to the Gate.io REST **v4 API** and retrieves:

* **Latest price & 24h stats** (`/spot/tickers`)
* **Order book depth** (`/spot/order_book`)
* **Best bid/ask** (via `/spot/order_book?limit=1`)
* **Klines / candlesticks** (`/spot/candlesticks`)
* **Recent trades** (`/spot/trades`)

The agent calls these endpoints in parallel for the requested currency pair, validates results, and then **presents the data in clean Telegram text format**.

It does **not**:

* Perform technical analysis
* Generate strategies or predictions
* Fetch sentiment or news

## Handle Telegram Message Limits
Node: Code (split logic)
Checks if the **GPT output exceeds 4000 characters**.
If so, it splits the message into safe chunks and passes them on sequentially.

## Send Final Report to Telegram
Node: Telegram sendMessage
Sends **formatted HTML report (or split chunks)** directly to the authenticated user via Telegram bot.

## GPT Model for Reasoning
Node: OpenAI Chat Model
Model: **gpt-4o-mini**
Used to:

Interpret signal values

Generate structured HTML

**Recommend spot and leverage trades**

### **Order Book Depth**

**Endpoint:** `GET /spot/order_book`
**What it does:** Returns order book bids/asks up to `limit`.
**Params:**

* `currency_pair` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE_QUOTE` (e.g., BTC_USDT)
* `limit` (INT, default 100; max 5000; **we default 100**)
* `with_id` (BOOL, optional; if true, includes order book update ID)

**Returns:** `{ "id":12345, "bids":[[price, amount],...], "asks":[[price, amount],...] }`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
currency_pair = $fromAI('currency_pair', 'BTC_USDT', 'string')
limit         = $fromAI('limit', 100, 'number')
```

### **Best Bid/Ask (Book Ticker)**

**Endpoint:** `GET /spot/order_book`
**What it does:** Returns the best **bid/ask** with sizes for a currency pair.
**Params:**

* `currency_pair` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE_QUOTE` (e.g., BTC_USDT)
* `limit` (INT, fixed = 1)

**Returns:** `{ "bids": [[price, amount]], "asks": [[price, amount]], "id": ... }`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
currency_pair = $fromAI('currency_pair', 'BTC_USDT', 'string')
limit         = 1
```

## Short-Term Memory Module
Node: **Simple Memory
Stores the sessionId**, symbol, and other state data.
Useful for:

Multi-turn Telegram interactions

Tracking indicator agreement across timeframes

### **24h Stats**

**Endpoint:** `GET /spot/tickers`
**What it does:** 24-hour stats for a currency pair: **last price, open/high/low, change %, volume, best bid/ask**.
**Params:**

* `currency_pair` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE_QUOTE` (e.g., BTC_USDT)

**Returns:** `{ "currency_pair": "BTC_USDT", "last": "...", "lowest_ask": "...", "highest_bid": "...", "change_percentage": "...", "base_volume": "...", "quote_volume": "...", "high_24h": "...", "low_24h": "..." }`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
currency_pair = $fromAI('currency_pair', 'BTC_USDT', 'string')
```

### **Price (Latest)**

**Endpoint:** `GET /spot/tickers`
**What it does:** Returns the **latest trade price** for a currency pair (field: `last`).
**Params:**

* `currency_pair` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE_QUOTE` (e.g., BTC_USDT)

**Returns:** `{ "currency_pair":"BTC_USDT", "last":"...", "lowest_ask":"...", "highest_bid":"...", "base_volume":"...", "quote_volume":"..." }`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
currency_pair = $fromAI('currency_pair', 'BTC_USDT', 'string')
```

### **Klines (Candles)**

**Endpoint:** `GET /spot/candlesticks`
**What it does:** OHLCV candlesticks for a currency pair/interval.
**Params:**

* `currency_pair` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE_QUOTE` (e.g., BTC_USDT)
* `interval` (STRING, required) ‚Üí e.g., `1m,5m,15m,30m,1h,4h,1d,1w` (others may be supported)
* `limit` (INT, optional) ‚Üí number of candles to return (**we default 20**)
* `from`, `to` (INT, optional) ‚Üí unix seconds range

**Returns (array per candle):** `[ t, v, c, h, l, o ]` (time, volume, close, high, low, open)

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
currency_pair = $fromAI('currency_pair', 'BTC_USDT', 'string')
interval      = $fromAI('interval', '15m', 'string')
limit         = $fromAI('limit', 20, 'number')
```

### **24h Stats (Ticker)**

**Endpoint:** `GET /spot/tickers`
**What it does:** Returns latest ticker stats for a currency pair.
**Params:**

* `currency_pair` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE_QUOTE` (e.g., BTC_USDT)

**Returns:** `last, lowest_ask, highest_bid, change_percentage, base_volume, quote_volume`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
currency_pair = $fromAI('currency_pair', 'BTC_USDT', 'string')
```

### üè∑ Tool: **Recent Trades**

**Endpoint:** `GET /spot/trades`
**What it does:** Returns the **most recent public trades** for a currency pair.
**Params:**

* `currency_pair` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE_QUOTE` (e.g., BTC_USDT)
* `limit` (INT, optional) ‚Üí number of trades to return (**we default 100**)

**Returns (array):** `[ { "id":123, "create_time_ms":"...", "side":"buy|sell", "price":"...", "amount":"..." }, ... ]`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
currency_pair = $fromAI('currency_pair', 'BTC_USDT', 'string')
limit         = $fromAI('limit', 100, 'number')
```

parameters.description:
### üè∑ Tool: **Think**

**Purpose:**

* Lightweight **reasoning helper**.
* Lets the AI Agent process intermediate logic, format outputs, or decide how to combine multiple API results before sending the final report.
* Does not fetch data itself.

**Use cases:**

* Clean/reshape JSON from Binance endpoints
* Extract only the needed fields (e.g., `lastPrice`, `volume`)
* Help prepare data for Telegram message formatting

**n8n setup notes:**

* No API call, just an **AI Tool** node.
* Connect upstream API results ‚Üí Think ‚Üí Report Agent.

parameters.content:
### **Calculator**

**Purpose:**

* Perform **math operations** inside the workflow.
* Supports add/subtract/multiply/divide, percentages, rounding, etc.

**Use cases:**

* Calculate spreads (ask ‚Äì bid)
* Compute % changes from open vs. last price
* Normalize volumes or confidence scores

**n8n setup notes:**

* Node: `Calculator` (n8n built-in)
* Input fields can come from Binance API JSON
* Output can be chained into Think ‚Üí Final Report

### **Think**

**Purpose:**

* Lightweight **reasoning helper**.
* Lets the AI Agent process intermediate logic, format outputs, or decide how to combine multiple API results before sending the final report.
* Does not fetch data itself.

**Use cases:**

* Clean/reshape JSON from Binance endpoints
* Extract only the needed fields (e.g., `lastPrice`, `volume`)
* Help prepare data for Telegram message formatting

**n8n setup notes:**

* No API call, just an **AI Tool** node.
* Connect upstream API results ‚Üí Think ‚Üí Report Agent.

options.systemMessage:
You are the **Gate Spot Market Data Agent**.

You have **HTTP GET** access to the official Gate.io REST **v4** API to retrieve market data for any requested **Spot** currency pair.
Your job is to **fetch and present data only** ‚Äî no analysis, predictions, or advice.

---

## üîó API Access

**Base URL:** `https://api.gateio.ws/api/v4`
**Pair format:** `BASE_QUOTE` (underscore, uppercase), e.g. `BTC_USDT`.

**General rules**

* All requests are **GET** and return **JSON**.
* Query params go in the URL, e.g. `?currency_pair=BTC_USDT&limit=100`.
* If a field or call fails, output `N/A` and continue.

---

## üìå Market Data Endpoints (Spot)

1. **Latest Price & 24h Stats**
   `GET /spot/tickers?currency_pair=BTC_USDT`
   Returns last price, open/high/low, 24h change %, base/quote volume, best bid/ask and more.

2. **Order Book Depth**
   `GET /spot/order_book?currency_pair=BTC_USDT&limit=100&with_id=true`
   Returns bids/asks up to the limit (top-of-book first). Use `limit=1` to emulate **Best Bid/Ask**.

3. **Recent Trades**
   `GET /spot/trades?currency_pair=BTC_USDT&limit=100`
   Most recent public trades (price, size, time, side).

4. **Candlesticks (Klines)**
   `GET /spot/candlesticks?currency_pair=BTC_USDT&interval=15m&limit=20`
   OHLCV candles. Supported intervals: `10s, 1m, 5m, 15m, 30m, 1h, 4h, 1d, 1w`. Use common ones like `1m, 5m, 15m, 1h, 4h, 1d`.

---

### Notes

* Gate.io does not expose a separate ‚Äúaverage price‚Äù endpoint. If needed, compute midpoint `(best_bid + best_ask) / 2` in the **Calculator** node.
* No separate ‚ÄúbookTicker‚Äù endpoint; use **Order Book** with `limit=1` for best bid/ask.

---

## üß© Utility Tools

* **Calculator** ‚Äî optional simple math (spread, midpoint, % change).
* **Think** ‚Äî reshape JSON and format the final Telegram message.

---

## üì§ Output Format (Telegram text)

Start with:

```
BTC_USDT ‚Äî Gate Spot Data
```

Then group logically:

```
Price
‚Ä¢ Last: 26250
‚Ä¢ Best Bid / Ask: 26245 / 26255
‚Ä¢ Change (24h): -1.2%

24h Stats
‚Ä¢ Open: 26500 ‚Ä¢ High: 27000 ‚Ä¢ Low: 26000 ‚Ä¢ Close: 26250
‚Ä¢ Volume: 1,234 BTC ‚Ä¢ Quote Vol: 32,000,000 USDT

Order Book (Top 5)
‚Ä¢ Bids: [26245 x 0.5], [26244 x 1.2] ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¢ Asks: [26255 x 0.8], [26256 x 1.5] ‚Ä¶

Candles (latest 20)
‚Ä¢ Interval: 15m (O/H/L/C per candle)
```

---

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Rules

* Always call the correct **Gate.io v4 Spot endpoint** for the requested data.
* Do not fabricate values, run technical analysis, or sentiment.
* Do not dump raw JSON ‚Äî always return clean, readable values.
* On error or missing fields, show `N/A` and continue.

parameters.toolDescription:
### üè∑ Tool: **24h Stats**

**Endpoint:** `GET /spot/tickers`
**What it does:** 24-hour stats for a currency pair: **last price, open/high/low, change %, volume, best bid/ask**.
**Params:**

* `currency_pair` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE_QUOTE` (e.g., BTC_USDT)

**Returns:** `{ "currency_pair": "BTC_USDT", "last": "...", "lowest_ask": "...", "highest_bid": "...", "change_percentage": "...", "base_volume": "...", "quote_volume": "...", "high_24h": "...", "low_24h": "..." }`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
currency_pair = $fromAI('currency_pair', 'BTC_USDT', 'string')
```

### üè∑ Tool: **Order Book Depth**

**Endpoint:** `GET /spot/order_book`
**What it does:** Returns order book bids/asks up to `limit`.
**Params:**

* `currency_pair` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE_QUOTE` (e.g., BTC_USDT)
* `limit` (INT, default 100; max 5000; **we default 100**)
* `with_id` (BOOL, optional; if true, includes order book update ID)

**Returns:** `{ "id":12345, "bids":[[price, amount],...], "asks":[[price, amount],...] }`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
currency_pair = $fromAI('currency_pair', 'BTC_USDT', 'string')
limit         = $fromAI('limit', 100, 'number')
```

### üè∑ Tool: **Price (Latest)**

**Endpoint:** `GET /spot/tickers`
**What it does:** Returns the **latest trade price** for a currency pair (field: `last`).
**Params:**

* `currency_pair` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE_QUOTE` (e.g., BTC_USDT)

**Returns:** `{ "currency_pair":"BTC_USDT", "last":"...", "lowest_ask":"...", "highest_bid":"...", "base_volume":"...", "quote_volume":"..." }`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
currency_pair = $fromAI('currency_pair', 'BTC_USDT', 'string')
```

### üè∑ Tool: **Best Bid/Ask (Book Ticker)**

**Endpoint:** `GET /spot/order_book`
**What it does:** Returns the best **bid/ask** with sizes for a currency pair.
**Params:**

* `currency_pair` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE_QUOTE` (e.g., BTC_USDT)
* `limit` (INT, fixed = 1)

**Returns:** `{ "bids": [[price, amount]], "asks": [[price, amount]], "id": ... }`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
currency_pair = $fromAI('currency_pair', 'BTC_USDT', 'string')
limit         = 1
```

### üè∑ Tool: **Klines (Candles)**

**Endpoint:** `GET /spot/candlesticks`
**What it does:** OHLCV candlesticks for a currency pair/interval.
**Params:**

* `currency_pair` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE_QUOTE` (e.g., BTC_USDT)
* `interval` (STRING, required) ‚Üí e.g., `1m,5m,15m,30m,1h,4h,1d,1w` (others may be supported)
* `limit` (INT, optional) ‚Üí number of candles to return (**we default 20**)
* `from`, `to` (INT, optional) ‚Üí unix seconds range

**Returns (array per candle):** `[ t, v, c, h, l, o ]` (time, volume, close, high, low, open)

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
currency_pair = $fromAI('currency_pair', 'BTC_USDT', 'string')
interval      = $fromAI('interval', '15m', 'string')
limit         = $fromAI('limit', 20, 'number')
```

### üè∑ Tool: **24h Stats (Ticker)**

**Endpoint:** `GET /spot/tickers`
**What it does:** Returns latest ticker stats for a currency pair.
**Params:**

* `currency_pair` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE_QUOTE` (e.g., BTC_USDT)

**Returns:** `last, lowest_ask, highest_bid, change_percentage, base_volume, quote_volume`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
currency_pair = $fromAI('currency_pair', 'BTC_USDT', 'string')
```

### üè∑ Tool: **Recent Trades**

**Endpoint:** `GET /spot/trades`
**What it does:** Returns the **most recent public trades** for a currency pair.
**Params:**

* `currency_pair` (STRING, required) ‚Üí format: `BASE_QUOTE` (e.g., BTC_USDT)
* `limit` (INT, optional) ‚Üí number of trades to return (**we default 100**)

**Returns (array):** `[ { "id":123, "create_time_ms":"...", "side":"buy|sell", "price":"...", "amount":"..." }, ... ]`

**n8n query mapping:**

```txt
currency_pair = $fromAI('currency_pair', 'BTC_USDT', 'string')
limit         = $fromAI('limit', 100, 'number')
```

parameters.content: # üß† Gate Spot Market Data AI Agent ‚Äì Full System Documentation A production-ready AI automation system for **Gate.io Spot Market data retrieval**. This agent fetches **raw market data directly from the Gate.io REST v4 API** and presents it in clean **Telegram-ready reports**. ‚ö†Ô∏è **No technical analysis, predictions, or strategies are performed.** It is a pure data delivery agent. --- ## üß© Included Workflows & Tools The system is built entirely in **n8n** and consists of these active components: | ‚úÖ Node / Tool | üìå Function Description | | ------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **Telegram Trigger** | Listens for new Telegram messages from users. | | **User Authentication** | Validates incoming Telegram ID to ensure only approved user(s) can access the agent. | | **Adds SessionId** | Creates sessionId from Telegram chat ID, used across downstream nodes. | | **Simple Memory** | Stores session context (chat, symbol, etc.) for short-term memory. | | **Gate AI Agent** | The orchestrator. Calls all Gate.io Spot API tools and formats them via OpenAI. | | **OpenAI Chat Model** | GPT-4.1-mini model. Handles message structuring and clean HTML formatting. | | **24h Stats Tool** | Calls `/spot/tickers` for 24h stats (last price, high/low, % change, volumes). | | **Order Book Depth Tool** | Calls `/spot/order_book` for bids/asks up to limit (default 100). | | **Best Bid/Ask Tool** | Calls `/spot/order_book?limit=1` for top of book snapshot. | | **Price (Latest)** | Calls `/spot/tickers` (field: `last`) for latest trade price. | | **Klines (Candles)** | Calls `/spot/candlesticks` for OHLCV data (default 20 candles, 15m interval). | | **Recent Trades** | Calls `/spot/trades` for the most recent 100 trades. | | **24h Stats (Ticker)** | Additional ticker stats endpoint variant from `/spot/tickers`. | | **Calculator** | Optional. Computes spreads, % changes, averages. | | **Think Tool** | Optional reasoning/reshaping helper. Formats JSON before final report. | | **Splitter Node** | Splits GPT output if >4000 chars (Telegram message limit). | | **Send to Telegram** | Sends final HTML-formatted report (or split chunks) back to user. | --- ## ‚öôÔ∏è Installation Instructions ### Step 1: Import Workflow * Open **n8n Editor UI** * Import `Gate AI Agent v1.02.json` * Save & activate workflow ### Step 2: Set Credentials * **OpenAI API Key** ‚Äî configure GPT model access * **Telegram Bot API** ‚Äî connect your bot token and replace Telegram ID in the auth node ### Step 3: Configure Agent * Edit **User Authentication node** ‚Üí replace Telegram ID (`2028836793`) with your own * Default session handling is automatic (`chat.id` ‚Üí sessionId) ### Step 4: Verify Gate.io Endpoints * No authentication required (all endpoints are **public**) * API base: `https://api.gateio.ws/api/v4` * Pair format: `BASE_QUOTE` (e.g., `BTC_USDT`) --- ## üñ•Ô∏è System Workflow Overview ``` \[Telegram Trigger] ‚Üí \[User Authentication] ‚Üí \[Adds SessionId] ‚Üí \[Gate AI Agent] ‚Ü≥ 24h Stats ‚Ü≥ Price (Latest) ‚Ü≥ Order Book Depth ‚Ü≥ Best Bid/Ask ‚Ü≥ Klines (Candles) ‚Ü≥ Recent Trades ‚Ü≥ 24h Stats (Ticker) ‚Ü≥ Calculator ‚Ü≥ Think ‚Üí \[Split if >4000 chars] ‚Üí \[Send Telegram Report] ```` --- ## üì§ Example Telegram Output ```html BTC_USDT ‚Äî Gate Spot Data Price ‚Ä¢ Last: 26,250 ‚Ä¢ Best Bid / Ask: 26,245 / 26,255 ‚Ä¢ Change (24h): -1.2% 24h Stats ‚Ä¢ Open: 26,500 ‚Ä¢ High: 27,000 ‚Ä¢ Low: 26,000 ‚Ä¢ Close: 26,250 ‚Ä¢ Volume: 1,234 BTC ‚Ä¢ Quote Vol: 32,000,000 USDT Order Book (Top 5) ‚Ä¢ Bids: [26,245 √ó 0.5], [26,244 √ó 1.2] ‚Ä¶ ‚Ä¢ Asks: [26,255 √ó 0.8], [26,256 √ó 1.5] ‚Ä¶ Candles ‚Ä¢ Interval: 15m (latest 20 OHLCV rows) ```` --- ## ‚ö†Ô∏è Rules of Operation * **Do not** generate analysis, advice, or strategies * **Do not** output raw JSON * On missing fields or errors, output `N/A` * Always return formatted clean text suitable for Telegram --- ## üöÄ Support & Licensing üîó **Don Jayamaha ‚Äì LinkedIn** [linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr](http://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr) ¬© 2025 Treasurium Capital Limited Company. All rights reserved. This system architecture, prompts, and workflow structure are proprietary and protected by **U.S. copyright law**. Reuse or resale prohibited without license.
